Positive_reviews: Room, facilities, breakfast, location
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Very clean
Title: Good stay considering nothing was open

Positive_reviews: Great location, wonderful to walk through the park (especially now since not much else is open)! The staff was very helpful, and we really liked the design of the room. Lovely breakfast, brought to our room (no buffet because of corona). Lots of different food items even though we only mentioned our dietary preferences (vegetarian) the evening before (croissant, sandwiches, muffin, egg, yoghurt, fruit, juice, etc!). All in all a great experience.
Negative_reviews: We couldn't figure out how to connect our phones to the tv (which was given as an option).
Title: Great location, room, and service

Positive_reviews: Location, interior
Negative_reviews: Pillows are too high and firm. Breakfast to pickup at reception and eat in the room. I’d better get it delivered on request. The food is very mediocre, I’d get less items but better quality. Half backed egg was a failure and a mess. Sandwich with cheap bread from supermarket? C’mon.
Title: Nice and posh

Positive_reviews: Wonderfully decorated. Extremely functional. Friendly staff. Serene location.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews:
The room looked nice and clean, also the rest of the hotel was modern and clean.
The restaurant was fantastic.
Negative_reviews: The beds were quite hard and uncomfortable. The rooms are very noisy.
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: Excellent location; room and bathroom are super clean with great facilities
Negative_reviews: Wish there could be slippers in the room too
Title: Amazing and good value

Positive_reviews: Beautiful area to be located in and staff were so friendly and accommodating!.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: On arrival to the hotel we were greeted with friendly staff who went above and beyond to ensure we were happy and had everything we needed. They provided us with a map of amsterdam whilst letting us know the closest tram routes into central. Throughout our stay the staff were pleasant, helpful and were more than happy to help us with any issues. Room service was nice however options are limited which is the only drawback. Everything else was perfect and I would definitely stay here again when visiting amsterdam.
Title: Exceptional stay

Positive_reviews: The room was very cosy and all the measures relating to covid were in place without it being too excessive. I really appreciated the comfort of the bed and cushions and we enjoyed a varied and good quality breakfast. Located next to vonderlpark, the location of the hotel is perfect.
Title: A little nest

Title: A little nest

Positive_reviews:
Hotel was clean and the room is enough big for 2 people.
Everything was clean an the shower is excellent.
You can leave your car just in front of the hotel and pay, or leave your car at olympia stadion (20min walk).
Negative_reviews: The TV proposed some films, but you have to pay extra.
Title: Good geographique situation

Positive_reviews: Friendly staff, lovely room and very clean.
Negative_reviews: Can’t fault this hotel.
Title: Lovely hotel

Positive_reviews: Rooms are very modern and comfortable
Negative_reviews: Location was good but would like to be closer to the night life
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: The modern take on a classic building.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: very comfortable and big room
Negative_reviews: dining should be improved, not suitable for families with kids
Title: excellent stay

Positive_reviews: The hotel, the location, the staff all was perfect. Nice rooms not big but everything needed, the staff was super helpful. Set in a beautiful surroundings. Perfect!
Title: Loved it

Positive_reviews: We stayed in the Junior Suite. Excellent room with spacious balcony overlooking a quiet and upmarket residential road. Staff were very helpful and accommodating. They provided a cot for our baby. Close to a side entrance of Vondelpark. Bathroom had a large bath tub and a large shower. Would stay again and recommend.
Title: Excellent quality and service. Great value. Exceeded expectations.

Room_info: Superior Queen Room with Garden View
Positive_reviews: Great service! Very friendly! Especially mister Tomasz!
Title: We will stay again in this hotel!

Positive_reviews: The location near Vondelpark was ace —very green and quiet!
Negative_reviews: I thought the breakfast (17 euros each) was expensive for what you got.
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: From the moment we entered the hotel we were welcomed warmly, our room was spotless.  Room design and facilities were amazing. I especially loved the remote control panel of the whole room. Also if we knew how amazing the restaurant downstairs was, we would have had a table reserved. %100 would stay again.
Negative_reviews: We couldn't receive a strong wifi signal, it was on and off a lot.
Title: Amazing stay

Positive_reviews: We enjoyed our time here. Everyone were smiling, polite and willing to help. A big appreciation for the early check in, so we could leave our bags and refreshen up before our exploration of the beautiful city of Amsterdam and also loved after check out we could leave our bags at the reception, so we could hang out more in the surroundings before our departure. The surrounding has everything what you need, a grocery market nearby, beautiful restaurants and the biggest plus is that the tram station is nearby which tram nr. 2 takes you throughout the hottest spots in the city. And also loved the park/oasis at the hotel where you can enjoy your drink and smoke in peace. Would definitely recommend and would definitely stay here again.
Title: Perfect home base

Positive_reviews: So friendly, kind and helpful.  Made my twin 13 year olds feel welcome, even to sleep on the chairs in the bar.
Negative_reviews: We had to wait an extra 30 mins for the room and we were exhausted.
Title: Very enjoyable.  Excellent location and very quiet.

Positive_reviews: good room size, the bed was very comfortable, and the hotel staff were lovely.
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: Everything
Negative_reviews: Nothing
Title: Always great

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with Garden View
Positive_reviews: Pretty nice stylish boutique hotel with strategic position. Perfect connection with the center and the airport by public transports.Taxi to schipol Airport costs around 30 euro. Gorgeous inner restaurant. Excellent international breakfast. Restaurants and cafes in walking distance. Helpful staff. Small but comfy rooms
Negative_reviews: no bidet, no wc mop, bathroom door without lock. Lights switch is centralized so, at night, no way to go to the bathroom without waking your partner up.
Title: 4 days in Amsterdam

Positive_reviews: We found the room very new, clean and equipped with the comforts of modern technology with a panel that controlled the lighting, air con etc.  The bed was comfortable, and the water pressure in the shower was excellent, and the coffee machine was a nice extra. I  also want to add that all the staff were excellent and very helpful.  The location in front of the Vondel Park we also loved, and enjoyed walking through it towards the museum instead of the streets, however the area around the hotel was so beautiful and had some very nice selections of local restaurants to choose from, so it was also nice to eat close to home.  We didn't eat at the hotel but noticed it was very popular, including the modern little bar. I would stay here again.
Negative_reviews: Nothing, the hotel was lovely.
Title: New, clean, beautiful location

Positive_reviews: All excellent
Title: Great hotel

Positive_reviews:
The room was better than expected. Bed and shower are very good. Breakfast was great (coffee is the only let down) 
Would highly recommend!
Negative_reviews: Would be great to have a real coffee option for breakfast.
Title: Loved it

Positive_reviews:
Very good location 
Friendly staff
Negative_reviews:
The beds were very uncomfortable 
No water, laundry bag and tissues in the room which you would expect in such a hotel
Title: Perfect location

Room_info: Superior Queen Room with Garden View
Positive_reviews:
The staff were very friendly. Hotel was clean and bed was super comfy.
Lovely shower and toiletries.
Negative_reviews: Slightly noisy aircon that we couldn't turn off.
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: Nice bed and shower. Great location.
Negative_reviews: Everything was good
Title: Perfect location outside of the tourist buzz

Positive_reviews: excellent location
Negative_reviews: parking is extremely expensive
Title: great location and excellent facilities

Positive_reviews:
- Very quiet room
- big TV
- great large and comfy bed
- very beautiful location
- easy parking in the streets
- great service
Negative_reviews: - breakfast buffet limited, but due to COVID-19
Title: A little heaven in cosy Amsterdam part

Positive_reviews: Great location
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Beautiful, calm, and convenient location next to Vondelpark. Nice cozy bar to hang out in. Overall very nice service. Liked the decor style and the bed was super comfortable. Also liked having Nespresso machine in room. Great bathroom too. Loved the linens on the bed - natural fibers, good quality.
Negative_reviews: We arrive 30 minutes before breakfast was to close and the buffet supplies were very very low. It felt like they were already trying to close up. We paid full price for the breakfast so we should have gotten a full experience. They also turned off coffee machines right at 11 (closing time) even though we were still eating our breakfast. The decor at times felt a little low quality and I wonder how it will age. Did not like the artificial plants and flowers which gave the place a "cheaper" vibe. The furniture in bar was not comfortable.
Title: Cozy, friendly, hip, and convenient

Positive_reviews: Breakfast was very good, once the eggs that were help up before of lively discussions among staff were actually delivered, rather than be held up in the hands of one of the staff. Perhaps guests need a greater priority than the lights.
Negative_reviews: Nobody seemed to be able to communicate in Dutch. A bit odd, when visiting Amsterdam, I thought.
Title: Worth a repeat.

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with Garden View
Positive_reviews: Fantastic location! Quiet and just a walking distance from center.
Title: Hope to come to stay again!

Positive_reviews:
It is a good hotel, a bit expensive for my standards but it is in fact pretty fancy.
The position is ok, you need to go on a tram ride to reach the centre, but you have a beautiful big park nearby. Plus it is possible to walk to several museums like the Van Gogh one.
Negative_reviews:
Rooms are not exceptionally big for two people, but still they are cozy and enjoyable.
To me, breakfast was overpriced for what they offer there.
Title: Nice stay!

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with Garden View
Positive_reviews:
The location most of all. The revamp of the hotel has taken it back up to where it used to be and improved on the feel. 
The bar area was warm and welcoming.
Negative_reviews: The Italian menu.
Title: Very enjoyable, well located hotel.

Positive_reviews: Very comfortable, well equipped clean room, convenient location for museums/galleries, very friendly and helpful staff, excellent Venetian restaurant/bar. Will definitely try and stay here again on our next visit to Amsterdam.
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Excellent location in quiet plush upmarket neighbourhood a few minutes walk from Vondel Park. There are many bars and brasseries within a short walking distance. A 15 minute tram ride will take you into the centre of town. The excellent Kashmir Lounge coffee shop and very welcoming local bars are a 20 minute walk away on Jan Pieter Heijestraat. The hotel (397 bus from the airport to Emmastraat) is superb and beautifully appointed. The Italian themed bar and restaurant were constantly busy during my stay. The staff were extremely helpful and attentive and went out of their way to make you feel welcome. I was upgraded to a larger room at no extra cost.
Negative_reviews: Breakfast was a little disorganized at times. I had to request my food to be re-heated because it was cold from the buffet. Some of the food took a while to be replaced with fresh items. Overall, the breakfast was a little underwhelming.
Title: Excellent, spotlessly clean and well appointed hotel with very helpful and welcoming staff.

Room_info: Superior Queen Room with Garden View
Positive_reviews: Lovely welcome as we were soaking wet after cycling in pouring rain.  We had a lovely room which was very quiet with an excellent shower and beautiful bed linen and comfortable mattress.
Negative_reviews:
It would be nice to have cycle parking with a cover against the rain.
Not enough places to hang outdoor clothes  - really could do with some hooks on the wall behind the door for wet coats - we were in room 454 - easy enough to resolve. 
I felt the restaurant was overpriced and too niche.
Title: Wonderful

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with Garden View
Positive_reviews:
Comfort
Friendliness of the team 
Location
Negative_reviews: Gym equipment is limited
Title: Perfect home base in a prime location

Positive_reviews: Good sized room, the location is great as it’s right by the park and the design of the hotel is really nice.
Negative_reviews: The restaurant was average - missing items off the menu and found the food to be overpriced for what it was.
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: Breakfast was very good, the location is wonderful, on the edge of Vondelpark, surrounded by trees and beautiful houses, the hotel includes a delicious Italian restaurant, the staff is attentive and polite, the room spotless, the towels very clean. I will stay there again!
Title: A hidden gem!

Positive_reviews: Clean and very comfortable
Negative_reviews: Not a lot
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: Very nice and alive bar and restaurant area; excellent quality breakfast; surrounding neighborhood is a cozy spot in Amsterdam
Negative_reviews: A bit more space in the room and something to lay the luggage would make it perfect
Title: Pleasant stay in a quiet and cool area

Positive_reviews:
Staff are lovely, genuine and friendly. Rooms are spotlessly clean. Linen and towels fresh & white. 
Absolutely faultless.
Title: Perfect.

Room_info: Superior Queen Room with Garden View
Positive_reviews:
very friendly staff.  helpful to be able to store bags.  comfortable room.  Good bed.
Location was good next to Vondelpark, and near museums.
Negative_reviews:
I reserved a room with garden view, and got email confirmation from Park Plaza.  When I got there they tried to give me a street view.  Finally upgraded to a room that was too high and more viewed a building than the garden.
Lights are controlled at a multi-switch next to bed, instead of individual lights for different locations in the room.  This is inconvenient, doesn't enable doing the lighting we wanted, and hard to learn to use.  They should go back to the old system and ditch this new tech one.
breakfast was ok, but hard to get anything smaller than the more costly buffet.
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Very clean and tidy , staff very helpful
Negative_reviews: Nothing
Title: Nice place to stay

Positive_reviews: Modern hotel with thoughtful touches - good hairdryer, mineral water on demand. Our room smelt fresh and we slept extremely well. Breakfast room beautiful with natural light, breakfast buffet excellent. USB points, clever control console for lights and good sound quality on in-room tv (music). Thanks, we had a lovely stay.
Negative_reviews: Gym somewhat stuffy, but go for a walk in Vondelpark ;)
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews:
I managed to book at a last minute rate so good value, exceptional welcome, superb room, very clean. 
This is a particularly good hotel, I recommend it very highly.
Negative_reviews: Parking was close by but extraordinarily expensive (but that’s Amsterdam for you), not really many restaurants close by but you cannot blame the hotel for that.
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: The room was cozy with a comfortable bed and nice bathroom.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews:
They really took good care of us. All my special requests were all been arranged by staff Marcos.
Room are fully equipped with nice view and comfortable bed. Definitely need to try their restaurant !!
Negative_reviews: Everything remained wonderful until the moment we checked out on 27th noon. The woman with blonde hair who helped me to check out was totally not respectful. She was even chatting with other employees passing by front desk while I was asking her questions. She was the only reason that I can’t give 10 of their service. Otherwise everything was so perfect here.
Title: Cozy corner in Amsterdam! Will definitely come back again

Positive_reviews: Vondelpark is very conveniently located - it’s a quaint area and close to the various museums. We will be staying here again!
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: Friendly and lovely reception team, easy to access on the tram from Amsterdam station, beautiful rooms loved the mood lighting! Gorgeous bathrooms - luxury. Beds were extremely comfy - best nights sleep ever!
Negative_reviews:
We can’t fault the hotel itself, however we dined at TOZI on our first night and this restaurant seriously let’s down the branding and messaging of the hotel.
When we arrived we asked for a reservation at the restaurant for 6pm. The receptionist kindly took us to the restaurant reservations team where we were told it was totally fully booked. Even for 6pm they had zero tables available. Disappointed we headed back to our room, changed and went back down to try TOZI bar. We asked if it was possible to order something from the restaurant to eat in the bar. The very rude bar lady told us absolutely not - and instead offered us a table reluctantly in the restaurant. Upon arrival in the restaurant we looked around to find only 2 tables occupied. It was now 6.30pm. The atmosphere in the restaurant was hostile and pretentious, men in tweed suits prancing around doing nothing and dictating what and how we should order from the menu - there was sexism in the patronising way they spoke to us. The food was ok, although they need to work on their carbonara as it was actually pasta in a cheese fondu sauce which after a couple of mouthfuls was inedible. The lardons were also covered in pig hair. The wine was free poured instead of being bought to us by the glass. After a very disappointing dining experience we walked past the reservation screen and noted that half the table had not been reserved so why were we told it was fully booked? We would strongly urge hotel management to rethink its association with this restaurant.
Title: Beautiful and luxurious hotel, let down badly by its association with TOZI restaurant

Positive_reviews: Rooms were newly renovated and they were spacious for Amsterdam. Free tea and coffee variety in the room was very good. Even though the hotel is not very close to the city center, ti is very nice neighborhood.
Negative_reviews: There were no slippers in the room.
Title: Good quality but could be less expensive

Positive_reviews: very friendly staff!!
Negative_reviews: Dangerous steps at the entrance!!!
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: Finally a hotel that I would love to come back to when visiting Amsterdam. Clean and really nicely made. Convenient for transport use and really close to quite a nice  park if you want to have a run. Recommending!
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Staff were very friendly and helpful. Room was perfect for a city break. Cosy but not too small and very comfortable and stylish!
Title: Stylish, comfortable stay

Positive_reviews: A well-appointed comfortable hotel just outside of the centre of Amsterdam. Easy to get to the tourist hotspots and great walk on Vondelpark
Negative_reviews: Room on the small side so luggage tended to get in the way. Drawers and shelves are all black with no lighting so you can see nothing that is in there, torches are needed to get dressed :)
Title: Lots of Character, and very well appointed. Easy transport to any place in Amsterdam

Positive_reviews: Very cozy rooms, modern tv system - you can connect via iPhone and watch whatever you want. Good breakfast choice and very nice area around the hotel - beautiful houses and park. Just a 10 min walk to the 397 bus to the airport.
Negative_reviews: Dinner at the hotel was a big disappointment - small portions, overpriced and low quality. Tomatoes in burrata salad were green, the burrata itself was size of an egg - this dish was an insult to Italian cuisine. Others were not much better.
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: We paid to upgrade our standard room to a better one, which turned out to be a really good deal. The suite with balcony is huge and beautiful. A good value for money! Staff is super friendly!  Breakfast is delicious.
Negative_reviews: The standard room is very small. Clean and beautiful though.
Title: A wonderful experience!

Positive_reviews: Breakfast was brilliant. Loved the little touches in the room, such as the books and toiletries.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Modern quaint hotel located in a lovely suburb opposite the Vondel Park. Friendly staff!   Would definitely visit there again on our next trip to Amsterdam.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Breakfast buffet choice very good and good quality. Like the real tea leaves tees served. Good choice of healthy foods.
Negative_reviews: My room was quite compact again. Not much room to move around, however comfortable and quiet.
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: Best shower and bed ever. Great welcome. Lovely breakfast. Staff were so lovely and helpful. Hotel had lots of great little touches and Vondelpark was a fantastic park. Cot was provided with some free toiletries for our daughter. Really, really enjoyable stay.
Negative_reviews: No ramp for pushchair but only a few stairs. Location slightly out but we walked to and from the centre with no issues and there is a tram stop. Not a negative as area was nice.
Title: BEAUTIFUL BOUTIQUE HOTEL WITH LOVELY STAFF

Positive_reviews: The room is warm and clean. The staff are very helpful.
Title: Wonderful experience

Positive_reviews: Cozy hotel in a calm place just 15 minutes walking to the Museums. Very good breakfast. Public transport in 2 minutes as well. The Italian restaurant is really good. They offer small dishes for sharing. the best Carbonara I have ever tasted.
Title: Cozy calm hotel in just 15 min walking to Museum Van Gogh. Excellent Italian Restaurant.

Positive_reviews: Friendly staff, clean rooms, high quality linen, TV with casting support, rain shower head.
Negative_reviews: The room was a bit small.
Title: Excellent

Positive_reviews: Very nice food! I tried it both at the restaurant and as room service
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Close to the tram stop and the food is amazing
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: I Liked the location, not in city Centre but only a couple of minutes by tram into the Centre. The hotel was nice with friendly staff.
Negative_reviews: My bedroom was quite small and I had to put €50 hold on my card when I checked in. I did not mind but when I was refunded at the desk they told me I had to pay a city tax of 15€ and that was deducted from my €50. This was not outlined to me at check in. I don’t mind paying city tax but I would like to be informed before.
Title: Lovely hotel

Positive_reviews: THEY GIVE US SOME TEA!!!!!!!!!!
Negative_reviews: Nothing
Title: Great place

Positive_reviews: The control pad in the room for the curtains and lights
Negative_reviews: It is in a great spot for transport links and the park in summer, but, in winter a little more travel planning requires.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Location, close to Vondelpark and plenty of restaurants.  Staff (reception, restaurant, cleaning, everyone) was just amazing.  Our room (junior suite) and bathroom were awesome.  My wife and son just loved the place. We would be very happy to come back here.
Negative_reviews: Nothing. Loved everything.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Room was clean. Hotel facilities were superb. Staff were friendly and very helpful. Location was close enough to public transport and right beside the beautiful Vondelpark.
Negative_reviews: Room was a little small
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: I liked that the rooms were modern with the automated lights and curtains
Negative_reviews: The room was although perfectly proportioned it was small and the location is residential
Title: Very Good

Room_info: Superior Queen Room with Garden View
Positive_reviews: Location, style, welcome, comfy room.
Negative_reviews:
Even if I booked via booking.com, I had liked to get room on higher floor and not facing lift.
Breakfast was just OK. No fresh fruit salad enough. Only scrambled or dry boiled eggs...
Title: Perfect location and a nice place to stay

Room_info: Superior Queen Room with Garden View
Positive_reviews: The hotel itself was amazing, Great location if you do not want to me right in the centre of Amsterdam. Staff was amazing too, so helpful!
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Clean, staff friendly, lovely location near the park and walkable you the city centre
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: I've been many countries in Europe however this is the best hotel I ever stayed...Fabulous customer service till last movement...I would suggest the rest to go for it...Location was awesome...very close to Tram and just 5 min to City center.
Negative_reviews: Nothing.....except smoking room was not available
Title: Fabulous stay

Positive_reviews: The facility is very comfortable and the team is truly friendly
Negative_reviews: Minor maintenance issues such as broken coffee machine and leaking shower door
Title: Great Italian Restaurant on site

Positive_reviews: Friendly staff at reception.
Negative_reviews: The closing of room doors, which bang at the end. As well as the corridor doors. No soft closing system.
Title: Great stay in a lovely hotel located in a nice, central and quiet area.

Positive_reviews:
High quality boutique feel with lots of nice touches. Staff were friendly and helpful. The rooms were comfy and well appointed. 
Wi-Fi was free and decent for all requirements. 
Public Transport was close and the location on Vondelpark was wonderful.
Title: Amsterdam on the quiet side

Positive_reviews: Great interior design. Excellent location next to the Vondel park in a historical quarter with beautiful architecture/houses, it is nearby the city center but not too crowded with tourists.
Negative_reviews: The room service(food from restaurant) should be available also after 22hrs.
Title: Great place to stay in Amsterdam and experience the best of the city!

Positive_reviews:
Perfect location. Just in front to Vondelpark in a quite elegant and beautiful residential area. Nevertheless the tramway stop is round the corner and in a few minutes ride you can get to the city centre. Only 3 stops to the Museum's district. Many nice bars and restaurants within a 5 minute walk. 
Front desk and restaurant personnel very polite and professional.
Negative_reviews: The bathroom is completely included into the bedroom and the separation is made by a thin glass wall. No aeration at all. And very little intimacy.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Fabulous hotel, very stylish and comfortable. Breakfast was delicious plenty of choice. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Great location, Vondel Park is beautiful. I would recommend this hotel!
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Very nice location, good restaurant, all very clean and well taken care of. Friendly staf
Negative_reviews: I booked two rooms . One was more expensive on the fifth floor but very small and overpriced tmho. The other on second floor was good value for money size wise. No bath in either room .
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: Great location. Lovely restaurant and bar area.
Negative_reviews: Our rooms were not available until 6pm on check in. They also were not cleaned during our stay as housekeeping came round at 5.30pm when we were back from being out all day and needed to shower etc.
Title: Good

Positive_reviews:
Staff are helpful and friendly. 
Great location next to the park and close enough to the tram stop. 
The room was clean with many mod cons.
Title: Great location and a clean, comfortable stay

Positive_reviews: Excellent accommodation in a beautiful surrounding of Amsterdam, really nice staff, looking ftw to come back.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Great location, clean, stylish and comfortable rooms, good breakfast
Title: Great boutique hotel

Positive_reviews:
Superb!
Lovely hotel, new renovated and cozy, beautifully designed.
Incredibly clean.
Friendly and welcoming staff.
Warmly recommended
Negative_reviews: The hotel is located a bit far from the center in a settled population neighborhood.
Title: Value for money guaranteed

Positive_reviews: The location was amazing! My parents love staying in off central places that are in quiet neighborhoods, and the hotel's proximity to Vondelpark meant we started each day feeding the birds and watching the dogs play. It was great easing into the culture of the city which was so different from the vibe of the area the hotel was in. Topnotch food for breakfast too, well worth the 15 euros, and the staff always had a genuine smile to their faces. Did I mention the free bird feeds that would make you the envy of parkgoers? :)
Negative_reviews: The bathroom was a bit too tiny for the room, and we weren't able to locate the central tablets / panels that controlled the lighting of the room together w temperature etc, bec housekeeping somehow hid them beneath the bed. We had to call front desk past midnight as we checked in late, but it was a fun problem to solve.
Title: Vondelpark Wonderpark!

Positive_reviews: Staff were extremely attentive and always made sure you have what you need. Great location right next to an amazing park
Negative_reviews: The room was a bit smaller than I expected. But was still a good size for your needs.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: The hotel is a recently renewed palace sited in a residential area, just behind Vondelpark, a very nice green area in the center of the city. The staff is always kind and polite, and the other extra services (such as bike renting, fitness area, restaurant ecc) enhanced the good impression that we had at the check in. Rooms and spaces have been furnished paying attention to every detail, setting a high quality standard for the hotel.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Very good aria,beautiful room, very comfortable bed,very happy
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Quality of materials used in the room were of high standards. Staff were very helpful, especially Victoria who introduced us to all the amenities and recommendations on how to get around.  Made my experience in Amsterdam very welcoming.  There r bike rentals u can enjoy riding like a local and explore vondelpark nearby and the neighbourhood.
Negative_reviews: Minor details. Shower stall leaked out water to the floor due to the separator being too low.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Really nice hotel and great stuff. Super location.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews:
Clean tidy room. Location amazing, quiet area, easy tram links into city centre. 
Staff were alwsys helpful and polite, doing all tbey could to help.
Negative_reviews:
The lighting in the room. Either on full or 'mood' lighting, which wasnt very mood like, still to bright to be called mood lighting.
Also the little cubby where the tea and coffee was made was dark, i had to use the torch on my phone to make drinks
Title: Overall a lovely hotel

Positive_reviews: Friendly, accommodating reception staff. Well designed rooms, nice bathroom and good water pressure in the shower.
Negative_reviews: Hard to get served in the bar, seemed to be short staffed.
Title: Excellent

Positive_reviews: The location is great! Love the neighbourhood around and the park is just a few steps away. Our attic room was very well decorated and comfortable and the roof view was great!
Negative_reviews: The gym is quite small and the ramp is not working, kind of a hassle accessibility when you have a stroller and a few bags.
Title: Exceptional

Negative_reviews: Room  cleaning  was  poor
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: Staff were exceptional, one in particular (Kiera) at check-in. Its a lovely property, located in a quieter area, great for walking, and access to Vondelpark.
Title: Exceptional

Negative_reviews:
Secondary entrance from main road to the reception.
The way from reception to the lift
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: The ambience was amazing and anybody visiting amsterdam must at the property . Quite near to tram and easy to connect to anywhere in amsterdam
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Terrific little property so conveniently located on the tram line and just 10-15 mins into Amsterdam Central. The walk in along the canal is just picture perfect and lots of lovely shops if you go via the street. The rooms are fabulous and come with lovely extras you don’t expect and the renovation is just about finished now save for the external gardens and when they are done it really makes this a great property.
Title: Park Plaza Vondel Park

Negative_reviews: There was construction being done right outside the room so it was very noisy.
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Location, clean , staff were amazing
Negative_reviews: A bit far from center
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: The breakfast was extensive and delicious every morning. There was something for all tastes and the food was fresh and delicious.
Negative_reviews: We requested an early check in because of a tight schedule but the room was not ready when we arrived. We had to request some additional pillows and it took two trips to the reception to fill our request.
Title: The location, comfort and staff friendliness at the hotel were all wonderful.

Positive_reviews: The bathroom was very clean, staff was extremely helpful and kind, location was good and silent.
Negative_reviews: There was a bad smell in the room.
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: Really lovely hotel, staff were great, nice room.
Negative_reviews: Just a bit further out of the centre than we imagined and tucked away down a sidestreet.
Title: Amsterdam is lovely, will definitely go back.

Positive_reviews: The whole hotel was modern and fresh. Beds comfortable and the staff couldn’t do enough for us. Brilliant location next to the park. Will visit again !
Negative_reviews: Very small request for a mirror in the bedroom not just bathroom.
Title: Loved every minute of it !

Positive_reviews: Staff is very nice, also restaurant is beyond what you could expect in this kind of hotel. They renovated the rooms and also have very big nice tv. Internet is okay. Not fast not slow. Location is not very far away from tram stops 5 minutes walking.
Negative_reviews: Non ending sound coming from the ac even when its off. Noise from the other room doors coming to your room, at 03:00 06:30 07:10 non ending, maybe because my room is in the corner and sharing 1sqm2 space with 3 room doors. The closets are black and also not enough light to see inside clearly. Even i found some lost pants from the previous customer....
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: Great location, with easy access to Vondelpark, Restaurants, Stores, Shops, Tram, etc. The Hotel itself is warm and cosy, with an onsite restaurant, bar that stays open until 1am and gym. Staff members are very friendly and helpful, always serving with a smile.
Negative_reviews: We booked the Superior Queen bedroom, which was a bit smaller than expected for two adults but given we were out exploring for the most part, we made do. On a positive note, the bathroom was a good size.
Title: Great Hotel, location & staff!

Positive_reviews: Location
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Clean, private rooms
Negative_reviews: N/a
Title: Well located and clean place

Positive_reviews: Good value for money!
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews:
I liked everything! The staff at the reception was very nice and helpful, the room was clean and nicely decorated.
The breakfast was delicious with organic food, fresh, and good products, just the way I like it.
No doubt, I recommend!
Negative_reviews: Nothing.
Title: Very nice hotel

Positive_reviews: Everything. Fantastic staff, lovely room, comfortable bed, nice bathroom, good breakfast. Peaceful location but very handy for the museums.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: The Stake ordered via Room Service was very good with quality of the breakfast on par. And the really special moment was the camera obscura generated on the way by the morning sunlight coming through the curtains (picture uploaded in the Happy Snapper section) :).
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Great hotel in fantastic location
Negative_reviews: Can not think of anything
Title: Great stay

Positive_reviews: Bed was comfortable, staffs were good.
Negative_reviews: Location was far from city center.
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: Comfortable bed, super clean, friendly staff.
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Location
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: We were pleasantly surprised by the level of the service, technology and comfort offered by the hotel. The location is extremely convenient - at a walking distance from the Museum quarter, but off the main tourist paths. The restaurant is very nice too, with proper wine selection. Happy to recommend the place to the others.
Negative_reviews: The size of the room is if a bit small. But for the short stay is quite OK.
Title: Charming hi-tech hotel close to the Museum district of Amsterdam

Positive_reviews:
The hotel is located in a great neighborhood, so close to a beautiful park which you can enjoy walking or jogging all day long. Although the hotel is a bit far from the city center and touristic attractions, you can find a tram station within 4mins or walk around 45mins to get there.
Staff are also kind and responsive
Title: Excellent

Positive_reviews: We have stayed for three nights and were celebrating my wife’s birthday. Everything what I have asked for was prepared in the smallest detail. Thank you to all the staff for a warm welcome and great atmosphere. Location perfect calm close to the park and close to all main attractions. Room very comfortable with amazing materace. Very clean hotel recently refurbished. Good food in the restaurant. I totally recommend the hotel.
Title: Fantastic hotel - great birthday time

Positive_reviews: Amazing staff
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Great location, we stayed four days and didn’t take any public transport to get around the city. Some bars and restaurants and Vondelpark nearby. Bed very comfortable and shower in the room was great, breakfast had plenty of options.
Negative_reviews: Room was quite a tight fit! We left one towel on the floor to be replaced, instead we were left all new towels and old towels left also...and they took a face cloth belonging to me which wasn’t returned. Reported to front desk and next day were left all new towels again which we didn’t want. Not great for the environment!
Title: Great Location

Positive_reviews: The location of the hotel is perfect and the hotel staff are very kind and helpful
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Wonderful location - right next to Vondelpark and a short walk from shops, cafes and transport links. Room was modern and everything we needed for a weekend stay.
Negative_reviews: Obviously some work going on at the hotel at the moment - big hole in the floor and few areas that could do with a lick of paint.
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: Nice bed, good pillows. Good bathroom with a nice shower.
Negative_reviews:
Room wasn’t ready at check in (despite it being 4.30pm and the room was supposed to be ready by 2pm) - but after a complimentary drink in the bar the room was ready quite quickly.
Room had good amenities, but no hair dryer.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Friendly staff. Great location by a beautiful park. 15 min to center. Nice neighborhood
Negative_reviews: The house keeping can be better. Breakfast very basic and eggs not tasty.
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: good location, very friendly staffs! Smart TV worked very good.
Negative_reviews: The lights control system in the room didn't work very well. A bit distance to station.
Title: Quite nice stay.

Positive_reviews: Location and it's quite area
Negative_reviews: Nothing
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: The services’ welcome early in the morning made our day better after our long trip. Good location, really good breakfast and smily service makes your stay unforgettable.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews:
I was cheated, but I don't know by who: 
I paid for an improved room, called “king size” a bigger one, and I got the most small one.
I'd really like to know who made the decision to charge me extra for placing us in a minimum size room, company Booking.com or hotel’s management.
Our vacation was largely ruined by a lack of comfort.
It wasn't just the money (and I intend to get a refund), but our entire vacation was below the expected level.

location, location, location.
staff very cooperative and nice.

Title: Very Good

Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Excellent attentive staff. Good location for restaurants and the tram into town.
Negative_reviews: Dinner menu could be a little more extensive, but restaurants are within walking distance.
Title: High quality accommodation with excellent facilities.

Positive_reviews:
Every detail they thought about it from the electric dash board to control all over the room , smart tv and a google chormcast ! 
The room is super comfy its the best hotel in Amsterdam I’ve stayed it was my first time and wouldn’t be the last one for sure 
In conclusion , I highly recommend it
Negative_reviews: Nothing to dislike !
Title: One of the best if it’s not the best

Positive_reviews: The location is perfect! The best neighborhood in Amsterdam. The room is good decorated and clean. The staff are really nice and helpful.
Negative_reviews: Nothing.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews:
great value for money, good vary breakfast. 
very clean rooms. we took the junior suites that came with a really nice balcony. 
20 minutes walk to the city center (but right near the park entrance)
Negative_reviews: for some reason there are no locks in the bathroom (sliding door)
Title: Excellent

Positive_reviews: Beautiful hotel, great location!
Negative_reviews: There’s was a little bit of constant noise coming from the pipes, it was annoying.
Title: Definitely a keeper

Positive_reviews: Staff was very friendly and helpful. Location is great- quiet and peaceful in a great neighbourhood
Title: I loved it. Feel like home away from home

Positive_reviews:
The location is great - A quiet neighborhood a minute from Vondelpark. The room was spacious and clean, the beds were comfortable and the lighting system was great, relatively to most hotels. The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. 
The breakfast was good.
Negative_reviews:
Maybe there was a problem with the sewer pipes because in the bath there was an unpleasant odor that seemed to come from the bathroom above us, and also every time they took a shower upstairs we could hear the water running loud and clear... 
Another problem for us was that at night, if you wanted to go to the toilet, the light illuminates the whole room because the separation isn't a wall but some kind of decorative glass.
Title: a very pleasant stay

Positive_reviews: Refurbished, stunning interior. Don’t be fooled by outer look, rooms very nice! Sufficient parking just in front
Negative_reviews: Nothing
Title: Perfect

Positive_reviews: The hotel is in a higher rent area without being too snooty, but just a wee bit over-priced.  If you are a teenager in your 20's you may find the location too subdued/boring.  The hotel is modern, quiet, clean and located across from beautiful Vondel Park, which is a good location if you want to be a little outside the hustle of the touristy city center, but close enough to it.  It is close to museums, which are within a short walk (about 8-10 minutes).  Our family prefers to walk so walking distance is subjective.  The street train is super easy to catch and use. You can buy train tickets on the train (no cash, card only). Plenty of restaurants and a few shops nearby.  Beverages in the minibar were free but didn't have much in it (water, apple juice, and sparkling water).  The air conditioning and blackout curtains on remote control were lovely! I would definitely stay again.
Negative_reviews: My bill was incorrect upon check out and the lady at the front desk did not know how to correct the overcharges and I ended up getting charged twice, however, it was eventually corrected a couple of days later.
Title: Great location close to museums if that's your thang! :)

Positive_reviews: Lovely place,perfect location and absolutely helpful and nice staff:)))
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Everything
Negative_reviews: Nothing
Title: Perfect

Positive_reviews:
The area is lovely, right next to the park and some really nice restaurants. Easy access to trams or uber taxis. 
The staff are really helpful with perfect English.
Great wifi, water and coffee in the rooms too.
Negative_reviews: Space in the rooms is a bit tight but the beds are comfy and the en suite is good.
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: See above!
Negative_reviews: Nothing. Perfect stay. Perfect room. Excellent staff and facilities.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Great location, next to a beautiful park and close to the centre of Amsterdam. Very nice and helpful staff.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: The hotel is beautiful and next to a really nice park. Great public transport links. Staff were outstanding - we had already checked out and were picking up bags to go to the airport. My husband needed to pray and asked if they have a prayer room. They didn’t but let him go into one of the conference rooms. Also, I wanted to send a postcard to my family and couldn’t find any post boxes in town so they took our card to post it. Such a memorable experience and I am sure I will stay there again next time I come to Amsterdam.
Negative_reviews: It was honestly perfect.
Title: I absolutely enjoyed every moment in the hotel.

Positive_reviews:
Staff were absolutely excellent, friendly and very helpful, especially Kate.
Newly refurbished room was comfortable.
Electronic controls for curtains, lights etc were useful.
Nespresso capsules and coffee machine were great to have.
Fridge with refilled water was excellent in the heat.
Luggage storage facilities.
Negative_reviews:
Bathroom had no bin.
There were no mugs or spoons in our room for the tea/coffee facilities.
We were not provided with the key to our balcony.
For €600 for the room I believe this should have included breakfast.
Unclear signage from the back to the front of the hotel due to construction.
Title: Comfortable and modern hotel, excellent service.

Positive_reviews: We think that this is one of the most beautiful part of Amsterdam. Nice restaurants, great places to sit outside, no crowd and just so pleasant.
Title: Excellent

Positive_reviews: Fantastic location, lovely walk through park to get to museums, good local restaurants, interesting area. Hotel newly reopened after refurbishment, staff very attentive and helpful.
Negative_reviews: Well appointed rooms, just missing a couple of little details: bedside lights for reading, towel rails in bathroom so you could hang towels up to dry and reuse them.
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Andrea on reception was particularly helpful to my wife when she arrived late after a cancelled flight. Despite a delay in the booking details getting through to the hotel. She ensured that a room was made available as soon as possible.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Quite place
Negative_reviews: Room entrance & location
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: The shower. Room light controller.
Negative_reviews:
Room should be a little bigger.
More availability of twin room
Food and restaurant should be available 24 all day
Title: Happy

Positive_reviews: Very nice location, friendly staff, luggage room, bathrobes, very convenient lights and a/c control, possible to attend top gym next door for free
Negative_reviews: Small bathroom, no restaurant
Title: Excellent

Positive_reviews:
The hotel, the rooms, the location, the staff++
I have stay here multiple times already and enjoy cominy back.
Extra mention to the night man Ferey (not sure if I spelt it right), always going above and beyond the call of duty to make the guests feel welcome and appreciated. :)
Negative_reviews: Nothing to dislike...
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Staff was super friendly and engaging. Typical funny & friendly Dutch! The room was just gorgeous. Everything was very comfortable; Sheets, soft towels, robes, pillows, and bed: all amazing. We had a double bed and the pullout couch which was a bed. I normally hate pull out beds, but this one was amazingly comfortable! The staff had it all set up when we arrived as well. Everything was spotless! They even  had a scale in the bathroom which was a helpful touch. The hotel is next to a beautiful park and close to a tram into the center of Amsterdam near the museum district. There is a cute area with some nice restaurants within walking distance.
Negative_reviews:
There were renovations going on so there was no breakfast which was disappointing.  
With the bed set up in the room, where were too many small occasion tables. which made moving around the room awkward. We moved them all to the side.
Title: Comfortable, gorgeous, and great location!

Positive_reviews: The team is very kind and helpful
Negative_reviews: There is the little disturbance from the construction next door but soon it will be over
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews:
Good staff and very good location.
The breakfast is great even if the restaurant is under construction.
Negative_reviews: They made me paid 2 nights whereas I stayed only one !
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: The staff is very helpful and delightful to deal with
Negative_reviews: There was construction that I wasn’t informed about and due to that most facilities were closed
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: I liked the location.  It has beatiful surroundings.
Negative_reviews: One part of the hotel is being rebuilt.  The dining room is currently very small.
Title: Nice place and location

Positive_reviews: Great location, staff were friendly, rooms were clean, bed was comfortable for me.
Negative_reviews:
Bed was too short for tall men. 
Could hear the neighbours music next door until 4am so we had a terrible nights sleep. We stayed a night away from my 3 young children to get a good nights sleep! So it was such a waste of money for us. You could even hear their phone ring when reception told them to turn it down. I’m not sure if it was even particularly that loud but the walls are thin. 
You could hear the lift go up and down and the smell of sewage in the hallways. 
For the money we spent for a junior suit it was not good. Wouldn’t stay there again. 
Great location though!
Title: Perfectly situated and friendly staff

Positive_reviews: Cozy and out of the central city makes it perfect to relax but still close enough to Uber to the center and enjoy the night life! We brought our bikes and were able to lock them up on the side of the building where they lock their rental bikes up.
Negative_reviews: VALET PARKING IS NOT ON SITE!! It is about 30-40 minutes away from the hotel but it is still cheaper and more secure then paying for the street parking. The Garden View room is nothing special to see just looks over grown with a koi pond rather have a park view for the money I spent, but now I know!
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: The staff were really helpful and friendly. Definitely easy to find too!
Negative_reviews: I wish the room had a full length mirror, the only mirror is in the bathroom. Apart from that everything was amazing, the beds were so comfortable.
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: good restaurant
Title: Good

Room_info: Superior Queen Room with Garden View
Positive_reviews: The place is situated in a calm area of the city surrounded be a cosy districts 40 minutes of slow walking away from the historical center. The Italian restaurant is a great place for a dinner, but the breakfasts were monotonous.
Negative_reviews: The stuff messed up with charging my card several times (in order to move me from one room to another), and as the result a minus appered on my debit card. The office was fast in trying to help, but the situation was not resolved competely.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: The location
Negative_reviews:
It was very hot in the room and in the hotel in general.
Breakfast was expensive, food at the buffet was not great. Would have expected more food options for that price.
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: Lovely hotel. Pleasant and polite staff. Good breakfast.
Negative_reviews:
Unfortunately I was unable to book the restaurant either night of my stay which was disappointing. 
I was in a room on the first floor at the front on a very noisy main road (all night). If I stay again I will ask for a room facing the park on a higher floor.
Title: Lovely hotel and great location.

Positive_reviews:
The staff at the reception was extremely welcoming when we arrived.
I requested a room that was not close to the elevator, and that's what we got. The check-in process was very smooth.
I did like the design of the room. It was nice to have coffee in the morning when we woke up.
Negative_reviews: We had a bit of an unpleasant situation. In the morning of our check out day, my partner and I were headed to the gym, when I realized, my AirPods were missing. After looking everywhere, I figured they were taken. My partner and I were traveling from Brussels, where I was for work. I retraced my steps. I clearly, had my AirPods with me when we left Brussels. And I remembered unpacking in Amsterdam, and seeing my pods in the pouch where I keep all of my cables (as any frequent traveler would I suppose). Before going downstairs, I asked my friend, who is the Guest Relations Manager at a five-star hotel, what is the general procedure. I then went down to speak with the reception. The person I spoke to was skeptical. Surely, that's her job to make sure, I was not making this up. When someone you never met, is doubting you, and your judgment, it is really hard to explain, that you are a responsible person, frequent traveler, and someone whose work is recognized internationally and that you would not make something like this up. She did inform the manager, who spoke to me shortly after. As we were checking out, the manager once again, approached me and said there will be a thorough investigation and that they would get back to me. I thanked the manager for the effort. And apologized for bringing this up, but I also had no other choice but to report the incident. Later in the evening, we noticed that my partner was also missing some cash. The reason we only noticed it then, was because it was our local currency. And since we were headed back home, we wanted to make sure we had enough cash for a taxi from the airport. Just as it was in my case, that pouch never left the room and he too was absolutely certain he arrived at the hotel with all the money in the pouch. I realize, this is why hotels have a safe but honestly, I thought it was a hotel with a reputational name to it! I also did not want to leave negative scores because we enjoyed the rooms and the service.
Title: Beautiful location in a quiet neighborhood, walking distance to main museums & comfortable rooms

Positive_reviews: The design of the hotel is really nice. The rooms are provided with everything you need. It’s a good atmosphere in the hotel and the location is great.
Negative_reviews: There were several surprises with payment, an extra tourist fee, extra breakfast fee(we paid for breakfast in advance, and it was an extra fee when we arrived), and a deposit fee. The breakfast is poor.
Title: Great location and atmosphere, but poor breakfast and surprises with extra payments.

Positive_reviews: Excellent location for the distance from the center (also wit tram). Nice breakfast content despite the relatively small space. Very nice staff.
Negative_reviews: Room keeping service very low. The room was summarily cleaned and the bed was almost undone (just put back the blanket to cover it) most of the times.
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Nice Hotel, nice and clean room Even though it’s small.
Negative_reviews:
Breakfast was not so good, not too many things to chose from. It was enough but not outstanding. 
Superior room too small. 
City Center Leidseplein by foot 25 minutes, not as others say 10 minutes.
Title: Nice Hotel but not outstanding

Positive_reviews: The location was great and the restaurant and bar was an added bonus. The staff were helpful and friendly. The room was equipped with blackout curtains for having a lie in. We enjoyed that the lights for the room could be controlled by a touch panel on both sides of the bed.
Negative_reviews: The room we originally reserved was dirty (looked like it had been forgotten about- soiled sheets, dirty toilet, and used slippers). But we were upgraded to a larger room and given a free drink from the bar.
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: The staff tried to do there best whenever we asked for anything.
Negative_reviews: Room service was only till 10pm which was quite a disappointment for such a chain of hotel. They didnt make the room properly.
Title: It was an okay stay.

Negative_reviews: The toilets flooded all over our room today
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: Well located in Amsterdam, not far from tram and Museum
Negative_reviews:
Housekeeping done only once (for 3 nights / 2 day stay)
Lot of noise during the night due to continious slapping doors
Small do it yourself coffee machine at breakfast instead of coffee pot on each table
On top of that, no reply from hotel (despite 2 mails) as we forgot a small bag in check-out desk area and we would have liked to try to recover it....
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: Only had to stay one night.
Negative_reviews:
Our room was dirty. Had a dried up mucus-like substance on our bed sheet, blood stain on the covers, the tables were extremely dusty and the shower drain had hairs from the previous guests. I notified the reception. They took half an hour to clean the room and only managed to remove the hair from the shower. We were given cookies to compensate for the trouble. Laughable to say the least. 
Besides the condition of the room, the check in process was cumbersome. I signed less documents getting a mortgage. Also, why reserve 50 euros on the guests' CC if you only offer water in the mini bar?
Title: Great location betrayed by the lacklustre service and poor hygiene.

Positive_reviews: The staff in general were very kind and helpful and polite. I loved them all! The hotel is well maintained. The rooms are small. I loved that they provided me a free access to a big gym just 2 minutes away from the hotel because the gym at the hotel was not yet opened.
Negative_reviews:
The housekeeping service didn't refill our amenities for 3 days until tbe reception have labled our room as VIP,  that was well appreciated.
The breakfast was good but with limited varieties. We stayed 8 nights so the BF was boring for us that we went several times outside the hotel for BF. There was no pancakes or waffles to order!
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: location and toilet
Negative_reviews: room service and the price
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: Newly renovated
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: Location is great and front desk staff is very friendly and helpful. Comfortable beds.
Negative_reviews:
Room cleaning can definitely be improved! A wet cleaning cloth was left on the bed and the bed was
covered with the duvet but not made underneath. Black glass table and surfaces were dusty and full of fingerprints and several
other details. The elevator needs a cleaning too! It’s full of fingerprints on the metal and looks gross!
Title: Housekeeping can definitely improve!

Positive_reviews: Looks lovely since renovation.
Negative_reviews: Staff banged on the door twice on checkout day. Early in the morning, hours before we were due for checkout. Made for a very uncomfortable last morning as felt like they wanted us out of the room. Last impressions are important. Ruined an otherwise nice stay
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Location was perfect - opposite to vondel park and city center is easily accessible via tram.
Negative_reviews: Very small room though it was sold as 23sqm - don't think it was. Daily cleaning was extremely sloppy, breakfast menu didn't change an inch over 9 days . I wouldn't suggest staying with children at all
Title: Park plaza

Positive_reviews: Charming hotel with nice staff in a chic, green corner of Amsterdam right by the Vondel Park
Negative_reviews:
The restaurant menu was very limited and the portion size and price of the food was disappointing. I spent almost 45 euro on three small "sharing" plates of food and a cup of coffee. Really bad value for money! One plate of food was cold (aubergine parmeggiana) and the other at best luke warm.  The waiter was sweet and offered to replace it and gave me a free pudding .. in "normal times" this would not be a problem as there are plenty of places to eat near by but current covid 19 restrictions means they are all closed and I had to eat at the hotel or get a take-away. My suggestion to the hotel would be to improve the pricing and the range of food available especially while you have a "captive"
audience. 
There is no room cleaning offered because of covid - not an issue for short stays but just worth bearing in mind 
Breakfast - no buffet because of covid
Title: A relaxing stay in Amsterdam

Positive_reviews: Best location: Beautiful park, close to museum quarter, and bakery! It wad best choice to stay during pandemic era. Value for the money
Title: Best choice of the year

Positive_reviews: Lovely staff, perfectly tucked away from the more touristy (and noisy) neighborhoods and nested right next to Vondelpark. Good public transport connection to Central Station and therefore the Schiphol Airport as well. The rooms are comfortable, with brand new appliances and lovely perks like coffee and tea available. Sparkling clean during Covid-19 times, made you feel safe throughout. Can’t stress enough how lovely the staff was!
Title: A gem in Amsterdam

Positive_reviews: Everything. It was really exclusive.
Negative_reviews: The garden view was a bit misleading because we associated to the park and it was a small gardening but it was good anyway.
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Friendly staff, modern, clean and super location

Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: we moved to this hotel after we were disappointment from another one through our visit in amsretdam. Such an Amazing hotel! amazing staff
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Breakfast was excellent, and we loved being right next to the park and out of the mayhem of the tourist-filled centre. Plenty of lovely restaurants and bars close by, and the hotel bar itself was gorgeous too. We had a really great stay and the staff were so friendly and welcoming.
Negative_reviews: I was unfortunately over-charged on check out but didn't realise until I was on my way to the airport in a car and read through my list of charges. I had been charged for things we had not ordered/purchased but it was too late for me to do anything about it.
Title: Wonderful stay in Amsterdam, the location was perfect for us

Positive_reviews: The hotel was close to Vondelpark and had a tram stop nearby to get into the city centre. Staff were friendly and helpful, breakfast was fresh and varied. The room was recently refurbished and had all mod cons
Negative_reviews: Housekeeping was a bit sporadic, some days the toiletries and milk were not replenished, on another day the rubbish was not cleared, and on one day the room was not serviced until after 6.30pm!
Title: Excellent Hotel in Great Location

Positive_reviews:
Very friendly personnel. 
Very nice location with great access to the city.
Negative_reviews:
small room
Exhaust fan in bathroom was broken and not fixed although mentioned at the front Desk.
Even though it was turned off, the A/C made a constant humming noise.
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: Lovely breakfest, great location, wonderful restaurants nearby, helpful staff
Negative_reviews: Extremly thin "walls" between room and bathroom are a weird design choice. Bathroom should really be a seperate room. My room didn't have a hair dryer even though it is listed, but to be honest, I didn't bother to inform the staff, maybe they would provide one.
Title: Excellent

Positive_reviews: This hotel really exceeded my expectations. The property is beautifully renovated. The staff was so friendly and went the extra mile to make us feel comfortable. The food in the restaurant was delicious. An excellent value for money - highly recommended!
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: The front desk lady who received us (Ann) was extremely nice, knowledgeable and friendly
Negative_reviews: The front desk staff at the checkout was not very informative
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Lovely room and staff :)
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Everythig. The welcoming supportive crew, the view from the window, the comfortable bed and useful coffee maker. The location, close to Vondelpark.
Title: The perfect relaxing experience in Amsterdam

Positive_reviews: The room is spacious and clean, especially the bathroom. And the service was good and pleasant.
Negative_reviews: The design of the room is not good as the pictures shown.  And the view from the balcony is okay but not as good as we expect from the price. And the plants from the balcony were not in a good condition, and the chairs were covered by snow.
Title: We expect more

Positive_reviews: discount of water and bread after hearing about the problems
Negative_reviews: the advertisement of sleep and dine together, I paid separately, and the portions are far too small, therefore also the price far too high, but the food superdelicious
Title: friendlly staff but small portions of expensive food

Positive_reviews: Dinner and breakfast were OK, but overpriced. Thankful for the tailormade room decoration.
Negative_reviews: Overpriced, uncormfortable beds, bad lighting, a lot of noise pollution from the adjacent room untill 04.00 in the morning.
Title: Very Poor

Positive_reviews: The hotel was in a good location, near the Vondelpark and relatively easy to get to. Neighborhood was quiet. The room was modern and had a proper coffee machine, which was a nice addition. Overall pleasant and quiet.
Negative_reviews: The room was good, but the look of it did not correspond with the pictures on booking.com; very different from the ad in terms of layout, color scheme, etc. Not dramatic, but also not accurate advertising. Staff was friendly (especially in the restaurant), but when we brought up the issue about the look of the room at the front desk, the receptionist did not seem interested. One of the buttons on the control panel for dimming the lights and closing the curtains was broken.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: location
Negative_reviews: non friendly officer in reception. the third bed in room was not ready, despite of his assurance
Title: it is not friendly Dutch management, which we used to see in other hotels in NL

Positive_reviews: High level room, very nice staff
Negative_reviews:
Sheats were not changed 3 days.
Twice had to wait for the room to be cleaned after 17:00 ...got fairly compensated but had to remind them....
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews:
The location of the hotel is excellent - just next to the Vondelpark and a short walk from the number 2 tram and the little Paris area (Cornelis Schuytstraat).   The Museum quarter is close, too.  A taxi to the Central Station takes only 15-20 minutes, depending on the time of day.
The rooms are recently refurbished and the hotel has a clean, modern feel.
Negative_reviews:
The standard rooms feel quite small, especially if you are not travelling alone.  The shower portion of the bathroom is is translucent, meaning that your vague silhouette can sometimes be seen from the bedroom.
Bike hire is available, but at a cost of 50 Euro per day (first day) and 10 Euro per day (second day and thereafter).  Alternative bike hire is available from 3 different vendors near the Vondelpark at a lower initial cost.  So the convenience of hiring at the hotel is probably outweighed by the expense, especially if you are more than one person.
Title: We'd recommend the hotel's standard rooms to business and solo travellers.

Positive_reviews: The location on the doorstep of Vondelpark. The staff were friendly and very accommodating. The rooms were newly fitted out.
Negative_reviews: The bedroom and bathroom were both extremely small and we did not even have room to open out our suitcases. The smallness of the room made it impossible to entertain our grandchildren in it which was the purpose of having an hotel room near Vondelpark.
